name: AnimationEvent.elapsedTime
description: The AnimationEvent.elapsedTime read-only property is a float giving the amount of time the animation has been running, in seconds, when this event fired, excluding any time the animation was paused. For an animationstart event, elapsedTime is 0.0 unless there was a negative value for animation-delay, in which case the event will be fired with elapsedTime containing (-1 * delay).

refs.name: CSS Animations
refs.description: The definition of 'AnimationEvent.elapsedTime' in CSS Animations.
